subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson’s new driver did not bring him much success in the first round of the Abu Dhabi HSBC Golf Championship, as he failed to make a birdie in a one-over 73 and wound up six shots behind the leaders.
snippet: Phil Mickelson’s new driver did not bring him much success in the first round of the Abu Dhabi HSBC Golf Championship, as he failed to make a birdie in a one-over 73 and wound up six shots behind the leaders.
